designations.source: A review of the scarce and threatened pyralid moths of Great Britain (Parsons, M.S.)
designations.source_description: Parsons, M S.  UK nature conservation, No. 11.  Published by JNCC, 1993.  Along with the review of Ethmiidae, Gelechiidae and Stathmopodidae moths (1995), updates the provisional review of Microlepidoptera (1984) using the old IUCN categories and criteria (pre 1994).
designations.reporting_category: Red Listing based on pre 1994 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa believed likely to move into the Endangered category in the near future if the causal factors continue operating. Superseded by new IUCN categories in 1994, but still applicable to lists that have not been reviewed since 1994.
